string.text: A loaded PDA. You can try to pull from him information about improvements, caches, notes, or money.
the Broken PDA. Such can only throw it, because it is useless.
Intact, but a depleted PDA. If to charge it, you can try to remove information from it.
Backpack with the dead body of the Stalker. Perhaps it has something valuable. We ought to inspect it. If the backpack is in very good condition, it is possible to make a cache.
an Empty backpack, once it wore someone else's clothes. Due to the very poor condition not suitable for the dead drop.
